name: Introduction to Programming
description: This course is an introduction to programming. Students will learn basic concepts such as variables, data types, control structures, and functions. This course will use a high level language such as Python or Java.

name: Algorithms and Data Structures
description: This course covers the design and analysis of algorithms and the implementation of data structures. Topics include searching and sorting algorithms, graph algorithms, and advanced data structures such as trees and hash tables.

name: Computer Organization and Architecture
description: This course covers computer organization and architecture. Topics include system architecture, memory, CPU, pipelining, and instruction sets.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: This course covers mathematical concepts important to computer science. Topics include logic, set theory, graphs, combinatorics, and probability.

name: Software Engineering
description: This course covers software development methodologies and processes, including requirements gathering, design, implementation, testing, and maintenance. Students will also learn about software project management, version control, and software documentation.

name: Database Systems
description: This course covers the design and implementation of database systems. Topics include database models, query processing, transactions, and database security.

name: Web Development
description: This course covers web development concepts such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side programming. Students will also learn about web development frameworks and libraries.

name: Operating Systems
description: This course covers operating system design and implementation. Topics include concurrency, process management, memory management, and file systems.

name: Networks and Security
description: This course covers computer networks and security. Topics include network protocols, network architecture, and network security.

name: Mobile App Development
description: This course covers mobile app development concepts such as iOS and Android development, user interfaces, and app architecture.

name: Machine Learning
description: This course covers machine learning concepts such as regression, classification, clustering, and neural networks.
